title: Module Parameters: experiment_notes_editor
description: Creates/opens an experiment notes file within the session folder and optionally launches an external editor so the operator can edit notes pre-acquisition.

experiment_notes_filename.description: Relative path (inside the session folder) for the notes file.

experiment_notes_encoding.description: Text encoding used when reading/writing the notes file.

experiment_notes_launch_editor.description: If true, launches an editor command to open the notes file.

experiment_notes_editor_command.description: Editor command to run. Use a string for shell-style commands or an array for explicit argv. If omitted, the module uses its platform default/editor settings.

experiment_notes_editor_args.description: Additional arguments passed to the editor command (string or argv-style array).
